page.title: 201.LEISURE 2.CONTRIBUTORS.
page.content: 1.There are a variety of facilities in Goytre village,but there is an underprovision for the younger age group.A major problem is the lack of sports facilities in the village; particularly the lack of a football pitch and tennis courts.The village is well located in relation to leisure centres but private transport is needed to reach these. 2.Mark Baxter,Leigh Jones,Emma Jones, Paul Herring,Barry Hopkins,Lisa James, Chris Bailey,Spencer Taylor, Matthew Hunt,Karen Jones,Gemma Phipps,Donna Singfield,Sarah Barnes, Lorraine Jenkins,Nicola Boyce,Clare Burton, Hayley Meacham,Carla Thomas,Ann Williams,Nia Williams,R.Curtis, C.Price,M.Minor,M.Vimpany,S.Jones, C.Larcombe,R.Herbert,N.Morgan,R.Jones, G.Luffman,R.Hodkin,K.Greenhalgh, E.Sutherland.Mr. J. Eynon.
